game.name: Prison Architect
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 세계에서 가장 무자비한 교도소장만이 세계에서 가장 무자비한 재소자들을 관리할 수 있습니다. Prison Architect에서 나만의 교도소를 세우고 발전시키세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Only the world’s most ruthless Warden can contain the world’s most ruthless inmates. Design and develop your personalized penitentiary in Prison Architect.

reviewHighlights.text: It was great when the game was first released by Introversion Software. It played well with no problems and if there was any, the developers fixed the...
the real reason to play this game is to follow around the one motherfucker who keeps stealing 10 sets of keys a day and tries to break out twice a day...
